knimeNode.name: PepXML Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads PepXML (as produced by the trans-proteomics pipeline) to enable processing of peptide/protein identifications and statistics using KNIME

fullDescription.intro: This node provides most of the key data from PepXML documents, as produced by the Trans-Proteomic Pipeline. This gives KNIME the ability to process spectral assignments to peptides and/or proteins and therefore to analyse the available data. This node is often used in conjunction with Mascot .DAT Reader and other TPP nodes to perform a broad analysis of results in a Proteomics experiment.
fullDescription.option: The filename which must end in .pep.xml to be processed. This file must have been produced by PeptideProphet 4.3.x (or compatible) or results have been untested

ports.outPort: PepXML data in row-format ready for analysis
